data.eml:eml: A new genus of minute Sparianthinae spiders from the Caribbean (Araneae, Sparassidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rheims, Cristina Anne, Alayon, Giraldo (2018): A new genus of minute Sparianthinae spiders from the Caribbean (Araneae, Sparassidae). ZooKeys 742: 13-22, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.742.21819, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.742.21819
